About.about-p1: Hi! I'm 30 years old, from Brazil, delivering solutions since 2021.
About.about-p2: Fell in love with programming when I started a fullstack development course. That was my first glance on the tech area, besides gaming, making me hungry for knowledge.
About.about-p3: Nowadays, I'm commited to improve my skills as a developer, while learning a bit about design, typography and UI/UX, scratching some designs here and there.
About.about-p4: I'm always aiming to deliver the best possible solution.

job2.description: I was responsible for developing unmaze's platform and maintaining it, focused on React. I've contributed with several crucial insights, which lead us to:

list.i3: Number of active users increased by 50%;
list.i4: B2B clients raised from 0 to 8 (last trimester 2022);

job1.description: I was responsible for creating layouts based on figma designs, focused on React.

list.i1: major increase of my coding skills along with a senior dev reviewing my code;
list.i2: major increase on communication skills and introduction to dailies, weeklys, reports, 1 on 1's;

content.description: E-mail and content are required fields.
